snippet: The Russian hosts of the 2014 Winter Games made clear long ago they would brook no political protests at the Olympics.
abstract: Russian Olympic Committee, wary of political protests at event, is quietly prohibiting several political activists from attending sporting events by denying them documents needed to gain access to sporting venues.

byline.contributor: Patrick Reevell contributed reporting from Moscow.

lead_paragraph: The Russian hosts of the 2014 Winter Games made clear long ago they would brook no political protests at the Olympics.

headline.main: Russia Blocks Several Activists From Olympics, Even as Spectators
headline.print_headline: Russia Blocks Several Activists From Olympics, Even as Spectators
